dmca.title: MLB DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Please read the attached letter from the legal department at MLB Advanced Media regarding a copyrighted work currently being streamed live on blogspot.com.

Thank you.

[redacted]
Rights Enforcement Monitor
MLB Advanced Media, L.P.
New York, NY 10011
[redacted]@mlb.com<mailto:[redacted]@mlb.com>






**********************************************************

MLB.com: Where Baseball is Always On
